darkSkinProducts.productName: Versed Press Restart Gentle Retinol Serum
darkSkinProducts.overview: A gentle retinol serum specifically formulated for sensitive and melanin-rich skin. This innovative formula combines bakuchiol (a plant-based retinol alternative) with traditional retinol for anti-aging benefits without the harsh side effects often experienced by darker skin tones.
darkSkinProducts.ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Propanediol, Glycerin, Bakuchiol, Retinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Alpha-Arbutin, Niacinamide, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Bisabolol, Allantoin, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin
darkSkinProducts.howTo:
Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin in the evening
Start with 2-3 times per week, gradually increase frequency
Always follow with moisturizer and use SPF during the day
darkSkinProducts.whyEffective: Bakuchiol retinol alternative is gentle on melanin-rich skin, reducing risk of irritation and post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation. Contains alpha hydroxy acids and antioxidants to even skin tone and improve texture without harsh side effects.

darkSkinProducts.overview: A lightweight, nourishing serum designed to strengthen and restore the skin barrier with ceramides and plant-based ingredients. Particularly beneficial for darker skin tones that are prone to transepidermal water loss and barrier dysfunction.
darkSkinProducts.ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Propanediol, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin
darkSkinProducts.howTo:
Apply 3-4 drops to damp skin morning and evening
Gently pat into skin until absorbed
Follow with moisturizer to lock in hydration
darkSkinProducts.whyEffective: Ceramides and barrier-supporting ingredients help restore and maintain the skin barrier, which is crucial for darker skin tones prone to transepidermal water loss. Helps prevent irritation and supports healthy skin barrier function.

darkSkinProducts.productName: Experiment Super Saturated Ultra Hydrating Barrier Serum
darkSkinProducts.overview: An ultra-concentrated hydrating serum with 30% glycerin and polyglutamic acid that provides intense moisture retention. Specifically formulated to combat the ashy appearance that darker skin can develop when dehydrated, while strengthening the skin barrier.
darkSkinProducts.ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin (30%), Polyglutamic Acid, Opuntia Ficus-Indica (Prickly Pear) Stem Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Beta-Glucan, Allantoin, Panthenol, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin
darkSkinProducts.howTo:
Apply 2-3 pumps to clean, damp skin morning and evening
Gently press into skin focusing on dry areas
Can be layered under moisturizer for extra hydration
darkSkinProducts.whyEffective: 30% Glycerin and Polyglutamic Acid provide intense moisture retention perfect for darker skin that tends to show ashy appearance when dehydrated. Prickly Pear extract helps with barrier repair and provides antioxidant protection against environmental stressors.

darkSkinProducts.overview: A multi-purpose, ultra-rich moisturizer specifically formulated to address common concerns in darker skin tones including hyperpigmentation, uneven tone, and barrier damage. This nutrient-dense formula prevents ashiness while maintaining a healthy, natural glow.
darkSkinProducts.ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Allantoin, Bisabolol, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin
darkSkinProducts.howTo:
Apply generous amount to face and neck morning and evening
Massage gently until fully absorbed
Can be used as final step in skincare routine for overnight repair
darkSkinProducts.whyEffective: Multi-purpose moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, and Vitamin C specifically addresses common concerns in darker skin including hyperpigmentation, uneven tone, and barrier damage. Rich formula prevents ashiness and maintains healthy glow.
